author: Adam K. Raymond
title: Crowds Gather Around the Country to Protest Social Distancing
description: Groups of protesters, many of them defying state and federal recommendations, are clamoring for the end of shutdowns.
content: One month ago, President Trump stood in the White House press room and told Americans to stay home to help stop the spread of the coronavirus. Avoid gathering in groups of more than ten people. Avoid discretionary travel. And avoid eating and drinking at bars… [+3959 chars]
